text: The 2018 Belgian Road Cycling Cup (known as the Napoleon Games Cycling Cup for sponsorship reasons) was the third edition of the Belgian Road Cycling Cup. Jasper De Buyst was the defending champion. Despite not winning any of the events, Timothy Dupont won his second title after already winning the 2016 edition. ==Events== Compared to the previous season, the Grote Prijs Marcel Kint was added to the calendar, replacing the Handzame Classic. {| class="wikitable sortable" !Date !!
